pre_text_caption_evidence: special asset pool special asset pool ( sap ) , which constituted approximately 22% ( 22 % ) of citi holdings by assets as of december 31 , 2010 , is a portfolio of securities , loans and other assets that citigroup intends to actively reduce over time through asset sales and portfolio run-off .
at december 31 , 2010 , sap had $ 80 billion of assets .
sap assets have declined by $ 248 billion , or 76% ( 76 % ) , from peak levels in 2007 reflecting cumulative write-downs , asset sales and portfolio run-off .
